prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will the highest temperature in New York City be between 33-34°F on December 12?
Recent trade: $1,411.82 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/highest-temperature-in-nyc-on-december-12

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, the highest temperature in New York City is forecasted to be 38°F (3°C), which is above the 33-34°F (0.5-1°C) range specified in your prediction market. ([weathershogun.com](https://weathershogun.com/weather/usa/ny/new-york/3284/december?utm_source=openai))

Historically, December temperatures in New York City average a high of 42°F (5.6°C) and a low of 29°F (-1.8°C). ([weather2visit.com](https://www.weather2visit.com/north-america/united-states/new-york-city-december.htm?utm_source=openai)) While the current forecast is slightly below the average high, it remains above the 33-34°F range.

Recent weather patterns have brought colder conditions to the northeastern U.S., with sub-freezing temperatures setting new records from Iowa and Michigan to New York. This Arctic blast is expected to persist over the next couple of weeks, marking the most intense cold event of the season. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/arctic-blast-grips-central-...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will "Avatar: Fire and Ash" Opening Weekend Box Office be between 90m and 101m?
Recent trade: $1,400.81 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/avatar-fire-and-ash-opening-weekend-box-office

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
"Avatar: Fire and Ash," the third installment in James Cameron's "Avatar" franchise, is set to release on December 19, 2025. Early projections indicate a strong domestic opening weekend, with estimates ranging from $100 million to $130 million, centering around $110 million. ([hypebeast.com](https://hypebeast.com/2025/11/james-cameron-avatar-fire-and-ash-projected-box-office-debut-100-million-usd-news?utm_source=openai)) This suggests that the film's opening weekend box office is likely to fall between $90 million and $101 million, as per the prediction market.

Director James Cameron has emphasized the importance of reducing production costs for future "Avatar" films. He expressed concerns about the high expenses associated with motion capture technology and the impact of streaming on cinema attendance. Cameron remains optimistic that audiences still value immersive theatrical experiences. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/cost-cutting-may-create-more-avata...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will Trump pardon Matt Gaetz in 2025?
Recent trade: $2,000.00 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/who-will-trump-pardon-in-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, there is no indication that former President Donald Trump plans to pardon Representative Matt Gaetz. In fact, Gaetz resigned from Congress on November 13, 2024, following his nomination for Attorney General, a position he withdrew from on November 21, 2024. Consequently, a special election was held on April 1, 2025, to fill his seat, which was won by Republican Jimmy Patronis. ([en.wikipedia.org](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_Florida%27s_1st_congressional_district_special_election?utm_source=openai))

During the final days of Trump's first term, Gaetz reportedly sought a blanket preemptive pardon for himself and other congressional allies amid a federal investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct and potential violations of sex trafficking laws. However, Trump publicly denied that Gaetz had directly requested a pardon, stating, "Congressman Matt Gaetz has never asked me for a pardon." ([foxnews.com](https://www.foxnews.com/politics/matt-gaetz-preem...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus strongly predicts "NO" for all three markets, with unanimous 5-0 agreement on Markets 1 and 3. The only minor disagreement is on Market 2, where four AIs predict "NO" based on projections exceeding the range, while one AI predicts "YES" by interpreting the same $110M projection as falling within it. Overall, the synthesized view is that the NYC temperature will be above the range, Avatar's box office will exceed the range, and a Trump pardon for Gaetz is highly unlikely.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: NO  
Reasoning: The current weather forecast for December 12, 2025, predicts a high of 38°F in New York City, which is above the specified range of 33-34°F. Despite recent colder conditions in the northeast, the forecasted temperature remains outside the prediction market's range.

MARKET 2: NO  
Reasoning: Early projections for "Avatar: Fire and Ash" suggest an opening weekend box office between $100 million and $130 million, centering around $110 million. These estimates are above the $90 million to $101 million range specified in the market, making it unlikely that the film's box office will fall within this range.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: There is no current indication or news suggesting that Donald Trump plans to pardon Matt Gaetz. Gaetz's resignation and subsequent withdrawal from the Attorney General nomination, as well as the absence of any recent pardon requests or discussions, further support the likelihood that he will not receive a pardon from Trump in 2025.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: Matt Gaetz is no longer in Congress and there is no current indication of a pardon, with historical context showing Trump previously denied Gaetz requested one.
